pages.text: $(li)Tired of not being able to transport certain creatures or blocks easily? Don't worry, I have the solution!$(br)$(li)Just press shift and right click simultaneously while you are pointing to the specific creature or block that you want to carry.$(br)$(li)For example, you can carry Passive Animals and Chests.
$(li)If this block or creature can be transported using this method, it will end in your hands.

$(li)Your walking speed will be reduced to a greater or lesser extent depending of the creature or block that you are carriying.$(br)$(li)You will not be able to access to your inventory or use your items in your hotback until you stop carrying the block or creature.$(br)$(li)To stop carrying just right click while you are pointing in a safe surface.
$(li)Some creatures can be stacked on each other.
